title: (x) coffee - ITC Stone Serif {Yves}
content: hi clever type people. can anyone help me identify this typeface please. ![coffee type](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802210322im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/12579.jpg)
author: kaff

comments.content:
[ITC STone Serif Semibold Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802210322/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-stone-serif/stone-serif-os-itc-sem-italic/testdrive.html?s=coffee&p=96).   
   
Sorry, I didn't see the e-mail notification come in.
